sentences.sentence: One of the most significant collections of Etruscan art in Italy is housed at the Museo Guarnacci.
sentences.translation: 在意大利最伟大的伊特鲁里亚艺术的经典之一收藏在瓜尔纳奇博物馆。

sentences.sentence: It might seem odd for the Museo di Capodimonte to conclude our summer series about hidden-gem museums.
sentences.translation: 本期我们将走进似乎有些奇怪的迪。卡波·迪蒙特博物馆，作为今夏的“深藏不露的博物馆”系列报导的压轴戏。

sentences.sentence: The typography used (Museo) repeats the shapes and rhythm of the ICONS to ensure further consistency.
sentences.translation: 排版使用(博物馆)重复图标的形状和节奏，以确保进一步的一致性。
